summary: Savegame - Speedrun - Main Quest -> Dragon ride -> last stage before killing alduin
descriptionHtml: I have done a speed-run of the main quest (and completed the war on the imperials-side) only! - the player starts of before he fly\'s to soverngarde, the items and weapons and shouts is what I earned from the main and the war quest...   no console used (except god mode)  :P   player is at lvl 5 i think with no perks added.    - a fantastic start for those who don\'t like doing the main quest 83 times! :P  like me :)
author: Rooster
